articles.title: About
articles.contents:
Hello world! I am Mike Porter, an Associate Professor in the School of Data Science and the Department of Engineering Systems and Environment at the University of Virginia. This blog contains a collections of short articles on data, models, and investigations related to the COVID-19 pandemic.
You can find out more about me from my various on-line identities
